description: Application for Non-Material Amendment to planning permission ref: P2018/2520/FUL dated 28/08/2019 for 'Erection of a mansard roof extension to create 1 no. two-bedroom self-contained flat, plus erection of a two storey rear extensions at rear first and second floor level to enlarge the existing A1 retail commercial unit and residential flat, and alterations at second floor level to the rear including installation of (1.7m high) obscure glazed screens and creation of roof terrace and associated alterations.' Amendments include: changes amendments to entrance doors; alterations to 1st, 2nd and 3rd floor windows; front stucco fascia addition; addition of 2 no. rear ground floor windows and replacement and enlargement of windows with juliet balconies in the rear dormers.
decision_conditions: REASON: The proposed alterations to fenestration, the shopfront, rear dormers and creation of new window openings would constitute additional development that would represent material alterations to the previously approved scheme. The alterations would give rise to design and amenity implications which would need to be fully assessed within a revised Section 73 or Full Planning application. Therefore, the proposed amendments would constitute a material amendment to the approved scheme and the non-material amendment proposed within this application is not agreed.
